examples: We're very sorry about the damage to your car.
Lamentamos mucho los daños a su automóvil.
I'm sorry about the mess—I haven't had a chance to tidy up yet.
Lamento el desorden, todavía no he tenido la oportunidad de arreglarlo.
She is obviously deeply sorry for what she has done.
Es evidente que lamenta profundamente lo que ha hecho.
We are sorry for the delay and hope the train will be moving again shortly.
Lamentamos el retraso y esperamos que el tren vuelva a moverse en breve.
